org.xbib.io.compress.bzip2

Class BZip2BlockDecompressor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbib.io.compress.bzip2.BZip2BlockDecompressor

  • public class BZip2BlockDecompressor
extends Object
    Reads and decompresses a single BZip2 block

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BZip2BlockDecompressor(BZip2BitInputStream bitInputStream, int blockSize) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int checkCRC()
      Verify and return the block CRC.
      int read()
      Decodes a byte from the final Run-Length Encoding stage, pulling a new byte from the Burrows-Wheeler Transform stage when required
      int read(byte[] destination, int offset, int length)
      Decodes multiple bytes from the final Run-Length Encoding stage, pulling new bytes from the Burrows-Wheeler Transform stage when required

    • Constructor Detail

      • BZip2BlockDecompressor

        public BZip2BlockDecompressor(BZip2BitInputStream bitInputStream,
                              int blockSize)
                       throws IOException
        Parameters:
        bitInputStream - The BZip2BitInputStream to read from
        blockSize - The maximum decoded size of the block
        Throws:
        IOException - If the block could not be decoded

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public int read()
        Decodes a byte from the final Run-Length Encoding stage, pulling a new byte from the Burrows-Wheeler Transform stage when required
        Returns:
        The decoded byte, or -1 if there are no more bytes

      • read

        public int read(byte[] destination,
                int offset,
                int length)
        Decodes multiple bytes from the final Run-Length Encoding stage, pulling new bytes from the Burrows-Wheeler Transform stage when required
        Parameters:
        destination - The array to write to
        offset - The starting position within the array
        length - The number of bytes to read
        Returns:
        The number of bytes actually read, or -1 if there are no bytes left in the block

      • checkCRC

        public int checkCRC()
             throws IOException
        Verify and return the block CRC. This method may only be called after all of the block's bytes have been read
        Returns:
        The block CRC
        Throws:
        IOException - if the CRC verification failed
